creator.description:
Identify the game engine that you use on your profile and everywhere you post!

Owner: @tabularelf.com

locales.description:
This user is using an existing game as a base for making their own spin off it. Whether it's to add new additions, new story, making extra content in general, or a completely different experience at its core.

Note: While all games do not relevantly support modding in their own  right, some companies do.
locales.name: Modding a game

locales.description: This user uses a game platform that includes its own built in or standalone game builder, that publishes to said platform. Usually applies to games such as (but not limited to) UEFN (Unreal Editor for Fortnite), Roblox, Core Games and s&box.
locales.name: Game Platform Services w/ Editor
